• All women with heart disease require referral for specialist evaluation and risk assessment.
• The following are symptoms and signs suggestive of cardiac disease in pregnancy
o Shortness of breath at rest or with mild exercise
o Shortness of breath when lying flat
o Haemoptysis
o Palpitations
o Chest pain
o Tachycardia at rest (≥100/min) or irregular heart rate
